title: Snowy Days, Warm Hearts
altText: Yukiki and Hanana dancing in the snow. Hanana is laughing and having a good time, while Yukiki is looking fondly at Hanana.
originalCaption: I hope we get more than one snow day in my area this time around!! -crosses fingers-
caption: It usually doesn't snow in December...January, on the other hand...

title: Old Everwyrm
altText: A reference of a gijinka of Shara Ishvalda from "Monster Hunter: World".
caption: A gijinka for Monster Hunter! I haven't gotten around to making gijinkas of any other monsters save for a few that I scribbled here and there, so Shara is the only one I made a "proper" reference for. She's a creepy grandma dragon who no one likes to visit, and she's perfectly ok with that!
transcript:
Text near her head: "Head twitches sometimes. Likes rocks...as a snack"

Text near her hand: "Cool, but not practical in opening soda cans. :("

Text near her coat tails: "Always moving somehow"

title: Time for a Kiss?
altText: Drs. Neo Cortex and Nefarious Tropy from the "Crash Bandicoot" game series. Tropy has his arms crossed behind his back and is looking down on Cortex, who is standing on a stool. Tropy is saying, "If you want to give me a morning kiss, you'll have t odo better than that, Doctor." Cortex replies with, " Go choke on your pocket watch, Tropy." while slightly blushing.
caption: I sure do love my old man yaoi! Well, it's not really "yaoi", but more like...oyaji-ai? xDD

title: Give It To Me Straight, Doc
altText: Dr. Neo Cortex from the "Crash Bandicoot" game series looking smugly at the camera with a cup of tea in one hand. The text bubble above him reads, "Me, straight? That's a good one."
caption: One of my favorite pieces from 2020! This was essentially a response to homophobic gamers who were harassing someone for making a very convincing screenshot edit of N. Tropy and Cortex kissing. I don't know if I can find it again...

title: An Actually Normal Family...of Doom!
altText: Two fan characters from Invader Zim. Dr. Vitamin is on the left while her daughter Amelia is on the right.
originalCaption: I've had fan OCs become their own characters, but never the other way around..until now! These two have been collecting dust, so I thought about putting them in a fandom until I figure something out for them!\n\nWhich fandom, you ask? lmao I'm too embarrassed to say, but the doctor's tag might give you a bit of a clue :'3
caption: \-whispers\- It's Invader Zim. :3c

title: Pink Sweeties
altText: A romantic drawing of a pair of Mew gijinkas holding hands and touching their noses together. Bright is on the left and Mr. Merry is on the right.
caption: A little piece for my sweetest Sam! The left is her Mew gijinka Bright and the other Mew gijinka whose name is Mr. Merry is mine! Bright is usually depicted as a 10-year-old in our current story, but these two meet and eventually get together in the future when they're in their 20s!

title: Island Getaway Advisors
altText: Human versions of Tom Nook and Isabelle from the "Animal Crossing" game series. Tom is waving with one hand with a calm expression while Isabelle is waving with both of her hands with a smile.
originalCaption: idk about you, but these two can take my money any day.
caption: You won't believe the comments I got from Twitter comparing Tom Nook to Justin McElroy! Like, come on, not every fat man looks like Justin McElroy or Jack Black!

title: Sugary Sweet Fluff
altText: A romantic drawing of Claremont (Chansey gijinka) and Hershey (shiny Slurpuff gijinka) with the two holding hands (and Claremon's right hand on Hershey's hip). Claremont says to Hershey, "You actually smell nice~" and Hershey responds with a smile, "Shut up, Claremont"
originalCaption: Hershey's been able to quit smoking, thanks to Claremont, and I'd say it's definitely got its perks. Claremont (right) belongs to Sam!

title: The "Most Unlikely Couple" Award Goes To...
altText: Ganondorf and Linebeck from the "Legend of Zelda" game series in an embrace, with Ganondorf hugging Linebeck with his cape.
caption: H-hear me out!! This started out as a "What if" scenario since the two both make appearances in "Super Smash Bros Ultimate". Ok, Linebeck is more of a static image NPC but still. I just thought it'd be funny to push two treasure-hunters together and see what happens, and now they're my favorite LoZ crackship lmao.

title: *sad trumpet noises*
altText: Spinel from Steven Universe clasping her hands together and weeping. Her dialogue reads, "My Diamond..."
caption: A drawing I rendered after watching the Steven Universe movie! I never thought I'd see such a sad rubberhose character! ;_;

title: Slip and Slide
altText: Lea and Isa from Kingdom Hearts as they appeared in the epilogue. Isa is slipping on a puddle of melted sea salt ice cream while Lea is holding onto Isa while screaming.
originalCaption: I was super inspired by how Tad Stones had been drawing him recently and I had to draw a thing. The coloring was mostly experimental here, but I'm so glad at how it came out! Enjoy!
caption: The piece I did for an Akusai (Axel x Saix) zine! I was sadly unable to render a background like I wanted since this piece was made shortly after getting my full-time job. This is also the final piece I ever made for a zine! Participating in zines was a lot of fun, but way too time-consuming and stressful for me. Perhaps another time!

title: Public Enemy # 1
altText: Negaduck from Disney's "Darkwing Duck" posing menacingly, with his hand stretched and the other holding his cape. His coat and tie are tattered.
originalCaption: Based on this [Tumblr ask](https://64.media.tumblr.com/32b4a821e16afaa3a6297a8d92c90f7c/tumblr_inline_prj8ukSLC11qze3co_500.png)! This was so much fun to work on! I've been meaning to redesign Waldo's kiddos as well as redraw some of [those silly poses](https://bechnokid.tumblr.com/post/184575079131). Now that's what I call killing two birds with one stone!

title: A Very Normal Photo of a Father and Son
altText: Waldo (Regigigas gijinka) and Diego (Regice gijinka) posing for a photo. Diego stands tall with his arms behind his back while Waldo is mid-jump with his arms directed towards the left side of the picture.
caption: I sadly never got to finish this series, but I'd like to revisit this someday!

title: He's Gonna Get 'Cha!
altText: Lea and Isa from Kingdom Hearts as they appear in the epilogue. Lea is in the background running towards an unsuspecting Isa who is standing calmly in the foreground.
originalCaption: I've been meaning to redraw this meme for a long time and now I finally have the perfect subjects.
caption: If you don't know the meme that I was talking about, look up "Jason Momoa and Henry Cavill meme" :3

title: Obsessive Fangirl
altText: Giovanni from the Pokemon game series and Terra from the Pokemon fangame "Pokemon Reborn". Terra is grasping both of Giovanni's arms while creepily speaking in L33t speak, leaving Giovanni very unnerved.
originalCaption: I was introduced to [Pokemon Reborn](https://www.rebornevo.com/pr/index.html/) thanks to Sam, and HOLY HECK it's so good!!! I wanted to do a small fanart of one of my favorite gym leaders, Terra, who happens to be a Ground-type leader just like another one of my favorite gym leaders!
transcript: Terra (translated): Oh my god, I named my Nidoking after you. Please have my babies!\n\nGiovanni: "How are you doing that...?"

title: Charming
altText: Anabel and Looker from Pokemon Sun and Moon in a very flirtatious pose
originalCaption: Wanted to try something a little different with my painting! Fallershipping is such a good ship and I blame Sam for getting me into it afhsdgh

title: Hired Goons
altText: A recreation of a scene from Tom and Jerry but with Pokemon gijinkas Tom (Meowstic), Cider (Torracat), Stains (Liepard), and Crusher (Purugly).
originalCaption: One of my resolutions for this year is to actually practice my backgrounds! So what better than to practice by redrawing memes? Granted, this is a very simple background, but hey gotta take baby steps.

title: Cold Shoulder
altText: A recreation of an famous scene from The Shining that showed the frozen dead body of Jack, but it's Rosa instead. She's not really dead, though.
transcript: Inspired from participating in my spouse's month-long horror movie marathon! It was also the first time I ever got to see "The Shining"! This was great background practice!

title: Bunny Bouncer
altText: A stylized Rango from Super Mario Odyssey spinning his hat on his right index finger. The background is a purple-pink night sky with some clouds, starts, and the crescent moon.
originalCaption: I found a new SAI brush to test out, and I also wanted to work with lighter colors! I hope to someday make more pastel pieces, but I think this is a good start so far. :> So yes, have a Rango, who's (unsurprisingly) my favorite of the bunch.

title: Rascally Rabbits
altText: The Broodals from Super Mario Odyssey. On the front are Hariet readying a bomb and Topper tipping his hat. In the back are Spewart menacingly chewing on a carrot and Rango standing tall and crossing his arms
originalCaption: Super Mario Odyssey is such a good game aaaaaaa. People can call them Koopaling rip-offs if they'd like, but I sure love these brutal bunnies. <3\n\n(Bonus points to whomever can tell which one is my favorite, lmao)

title: Cops and Robbers
altText: Giovanni as he appears in the Pokemon anime with Nanu. Nanu is tugging slightly on Giovanni's tie while slyly smiling at him, saying "Why so serious, GioGio?"
transcript: I secretly shipped these two for a while, so you can imagine how much I screamed after seeing an episode of them in a phone call together!!

title: The Doctor Will See You Now
altText: A gijinka of Raddle from Animal Crossing in an eerie atmosphere with him preparing a syringe.
transcript: Raddle is my absolute favorite Animal Crossing character!! I fell in love with him after seeing the new Amiibo RV cards that released for New Leaf.

title: ...Boss?
altText: Giovanni from the Pokemon game franchis posing strangely on a chair. The text surrounding him reads, "You aren't doing it wrong if no one knows what you are doing"
transcript: This was drawn when Sam showed me this [hilarious meme](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f0/db/0c/f0db0c994cf687bd26ff4843d0cccbbd.jpg) which immediately inspired me! It was great practice!

title: Friendly Spar
altText: Rosalivia (OC) and Black Hat (Villainous) in a sword fight.
originalCaption: An anonymous user on Tumblr asked me what would happen if Rosalivia met Black Hat from Villainous! Naturally, I had to try drawing something out. I imagine that they'd either have a friendly spar or have a [nice cup of tea together](https://78.media.tumblr.com/5c086e6b23e233c74b07cb179cf7e419/tumblr_inline_p5igukwBbv1qze3co_500.png). Or maybe both!\n\nEither way, this was super fun to draw, and it was a good chance for me to practice dynamic lighting! First time drawing a sword fight too!

title: A Grunt and Engineer
altText: Jennifer, a Pokemon OC who is also a Rocket Grunt
originalCaption: I rarely, RARELY make fan OC's, but I was compelled to make one a few days ago! There isn't much to her yet except that she loves to cook! She also prefers to be called by her full name and not "Jenny" after an unfortunate mishap that almost got her caught by Officer Jenny.\n\n(I imagine she sounds exactly like [Chi-chi](https://twitter.com/ChichiAi)! :3c)

title: Timeout
altText: Hershey and Claremont sitting on two blue chairs as if they're in timeout. The two are holding hands while hiding their faces in embarrassment.
originalCaption: A little thing that I wanted to draw a while ago. Totally not boyfriends or anything. Just a couple of dudes being guys! Claremont (right) belongs to my Sam!

title: Typhoon
altText: Rosalivia and Etahis (OCs) dressed as Vash the Stampede and Nicholas D. Wolfwood from "TRIGUN".
caption: Drawn after Sam got me into Trigun! God, I love Trigun so much, I still weep thinking about it. I should read it again!
transcript: Text near Etahis: "Could care less about religion. Don't be fooled. He's actually using telekinesis to carry that thing"\n\nText near Rosa: "A literal typhoon. God, just run away."

title: Still Quite a Looker
altText: Grimsley as he appears in Pokemon Sun and Moon in several dramatic poses based on a screenshot from My Hero Academia
originalCaption: A silly thing I did not too long ago! A screenshot redraw thing I finished not too long ago! I'm not sure what compelled me to draw Grimsley like this, but it was fun! My 12-year-old self would be so happy with me knowing that I figured out how to draw sparkly shoujo backgrounds lmao\n\n[Original screenshot](http://68.media.tumblr.com/5fa541ccdd26cd27a42e00eddbe7b407/tumblr_inline_ox4aabHpBd1qze3co_500.png).

title: Search in the Snow
altText: Grunkle Stan from Gravity Falls on the top of a tall pine tree. He is searching for a a mythical bird as evidenced in an entry of the journal. Meanwhile, the very same bird is perched on his head with Stan none the wiser.
caption: This was a piece done for a [Gravity Falls zine](https://gfwayfaringstrangerszine.tumblr.com/)! This one was a lot of fun to do and the first time I've ever contributed to a zine!

title: Calm, but Powerful
altText: Lucoa from Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid, stylized to have a heavyset body type in an attempt to match the size of her chest
originalCaption: Started watching Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid thanks to my friend Atomi, and oh my goodness, I love it so much? All of the characters are great, and I thought I'd start out with Lucoa! I wanted to give her a body type that matches her super warm personality, so I hope she looks ok! I alsoâ€¦have never drawn a chest size that big before, lol

title: Spot of Tea
altText: Grimsley from the Pokemon game series. He appears as he did in Pokemon Sun and Moon with the white in his hair, but he is wearing his suit from Black and White. He is sipping a cup of tea.
originalCaption: I thought it'd be nice to draw SM!Grimsley in his original suit from BW, and he still looks great! Of course he looks great. He's Grimsley. He never NOT looks good, even with his unfortunate aging.
caption: This image has been my wallpaper for ages (as of writing this in 2025), and I don't intend on changing it anytime soon!

title: The Real Man of the Sea
altText: Linebeck from The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass. He is crossing his arms while looking at the camera with a smug expression.
originalCaption: A lot has been going on these past few weeks. One of them being that I had been playing BotW nearly nonstop! So, I decided to draw one of my favorite LoZ characters who actually got an island named after him omg I'm so proud.

title: An Unnecessary Challenge
altText: Faba and Colress from Pokemon Sun and Moon. Faba is struggling to pick up Colress
originalCaption:
One of my favorite pieces! I hadn't colored like this in a while, so I was happy to know that I haven't lost my touch, yet!

I've always imagined Colress to be much taller than Faba and I'm glad that these heights are actually canon! That would make for pretty hilarious shenanigans such as Faba trying his best to lift Colress.

Ialsoshipthemsshhhhh

title: Coloress Science
altText: Colress as he appears in Pokemon Sun and Moon
originalCaption: Despite having played BW2, I was never interested in Colress until I encountered him in the Battle Tree! I dunno, but it brought back good memories hearing his theme song again and I really like his new design! So here's the Internet Explorer nerd!

title: He Got the Moves
altText: Guzma and Plumeria from Pokemon Sun and Moon dancing
originalCaption: Is it considered egotistical to be inspired by a [MMD video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2tZGxmkAKOU) you made? Aw heck, I don't care, I had fun drawing this!
